mapper.insert: insert into GQPDZDHB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SSSS, SSQX, DZZC, DZDH, DZMC, DZMS) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dzzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GQPDZDHB set GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSSS = #{ssss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSQX = #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZZC = #{dzzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZDH = #{dzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZMC = #{dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZMS = #{dzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SSSS, SSQX, DZZC, DZDH, DZMC, DZMS from GQPDZDHB
